--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> Havotron flew out of MT. Fuji heading West.  Not Far to go to reach 
the Decepticon base.  
> 
> Needlenose flew right behind.  Looking to Spinister he whispered 
"God he is obsessed with power."
> 
> Scrapper flew behind them in robot form, hopefully with the rest of 
the Contructicons behind.
> 


::LONG HAUL::

    Long Haul followed Scrapper quietly and eagerly. He was glad to 
get away from the ship and it's repedative duties.
    "If we're lucky" he mused to himself, "we might see some battle." 
The thought brought a grin to his face.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
